name: Doctor Fizzwizzle’s Animal Rescue
overview: Why has everyone fled the islands? There's not a person in sight! Who will feed the animals and find out what scared the people away? Doctor Fizzwizzle, of course! Bounce bubbles, rescue hungry animals, and solve a mystery, all at the same time! Over 180 levels of thrilling brick-busting action, and over 60 animal species to rescue!
